title: Sci-Fi Futuristic Music Pack
description: A collection of 14 Sci-Fi Futuristic Music tracks.
longDescription:
Did you know this pack is also included in our Ultimate Cinematic Music Bundle which include all of Epikton's tracks for better value?


 Whether demonstrating a cinematic scene from the cyberpunk future or introducing a hi-tech weapon, your music choice can make it or break it. This track is inspired by science fiction and crafted to let your audience imagine what the future feels like.


Potential use cases; sci-fi games, cyberpunk games, cinematic trailers, action scenes, and product commercials.


Ideal for passionate game developers, YouTubers, video editors, and gamers who need futuristic sci-fi music.


You can listen to the preview of the tracks here:


  • Epikton - Cybernetic Revolt 0:48
  • Epikton - Dark City Of The Future 03:05
  • Epikton - Digital Blood 01:03
  • Epikton - Emergency Exit 00:35
  • Epikton - Future Of Mankind 04:24
  • Epikton - Future Unfolds 01:12
  • Epikton - Invasion Of The Machines 0:34
  • Epikton - Laser Touch 0:30
  • Epikton - Nanotech 02:11
  • Epikton - Superposition 1:00
  • Epikton - The AI Takeover 1:30
  • Epikton - The Alien 0:54
  • Epikton - Trailer Counter 00:18
  • Epikton - Iron Shark 1:22
